name: leerming
description: Leerming is an open-source Django-based web app that follows the Leitner box method. Create flashcards effortlessly from PDFs, videos, and web links. Supercharge your learning experience.

name: sse-relay-server
description: Originally designed for Django, now a simple, standalone Server-Sent Events relay service, ideal for Django projects seeking straightforward real-time capabilities without the need for Daphne and async Django setup.

name: Facture Express
description: Online service for the payment of household bills, rent, water, electricity, etc. The service has been suspended in favor of the official service built by our government.

name: Izimanage
description: A multi tenant customer relationship management (CRM)  and accounting system for small to medium-sized businesses. Tenants are managed via postgres schemas.

name: cookiecutter-fastapi
description: A Cookiecutter template for fastapi projects, inspired by cookiecutter-django. My first experience trying to build a cookiecutter, one of the most boring things I've worked on.

name: dj-shop-cart
description: A handy cart manager for django projects. This package can be used for more than just e-commerce, it works for anything that involves a shopping cart mechanism, not just shopping carts.

name: fastapi-users-tortoise
description:
Tortoise orm database adapter for fastapi-users v10 and above. Tortoise ORM is the best ORM I've found 
outside the django world and fastapi-users the best authentication system for fastapi.

name: qosic-sdk
description:
This is my first python package and it gave me a taste of how the python package ecosystem works.
It is a simple python wrapper around a payment API of a local business.

name: Fwellbeing
description: An e-commerce platform for the sale of health care products, soaps, candles and ointments. This project is still a work in progress.

name: portfolio
description: My first attempt at building a personal website and also my first experience with the django rest framework (DRF) and docker (via Caprover) . Frustrated by the design, I threw the project away less than a month after putting it online.

name: projects-api
description: A simple API that allows you to save and query your projects. An experiment to try out deta.sh.

name: smsdrop-python
description: The official python sdk for the smsdop API. Easily send single or batch sms via python objects.

name: pgbackup
description: A CLI program to automate postgresql database backups. For the moment, this project is suspended since I mainly use django-dbbackup from the jazzband team.

name: smsdrop
description: A json based API to send sms campaigns. My first production fastapi application. The project was merged with Bepaid as a secondary service.

name: MailingTide
description: A SAAS platform for managing emailing and sms campaigns. It provides an integrated editor (TinyMCE) and a dashboard for campaign tracking. The emails were managed with amazon SES. The project involved a lot of data processing / cleaning of CSV and Excel files since users could import their contact list.

name: Personal website
description: The previous version of the site you are currently on. It's a portfolio to showcase my work and also a blog where I can keep a recipe/tutorial on the things I'm learning, it's my way of learning in public.

name: fuzzy-couscous
description: A cli tool to bootstrap your django projects and enhance your development experience.

name: htmx_extensions
description: A registry of htmx extensions, both official and third-party.

name: Personal Website v2
description: My personal website, the site you are currently on. It's a static site build using coltrane, a django based static site generator.

name: falco
description: Enhance your Django developer experience: CLI and Guides for the Modern Developer.

name: litestar-browser-reload
description: Automatic browser reload plugin for Litestar, designed for development use.

name: litestar-tailwind-cli
description: Provides a CLI plugin for Litestar to use Tailwind CSS via the Tailwind CLI.

name: python-odt-template
description: Render ODT files using Jinja2 or the Django templates Language, with support for converting documents to PDF via the LibreOffice CLI.

name: django-litestream
description: Django integration with litestream, a standalone streaming replication tool for SQLite.
